rows.label: tev014001_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_SEL0011
rows.name:
Ask Robert about the crystallized
gel that surrounds New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Robert about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0001
rows.name:
That was a special impact-cushioning gel that was used
to protect the base of the Habitat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0002
rows.name:
Under normal circumstances, the gel liquefies after
absorbing an impact.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0003
rows.name:
But during the crash landing, the Habitat was on a
direct course for Talon Rock to the north of here,
which would have been real bad news.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0004
rows.name:
So instead, they crystallized the gel, and by doing so,
managed to land the Habitat here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0005
rows.name:
That's the sort of quick thinking that Captain Nagi
was famous for. If he hadn't made that snap judgment,
New LA and everyone in it would have been a goner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0008
rows.name:
If you pass through the west gate and head northwest,
you'll reach a forested continent called Noctilum that's
home to all sorts of bizarre indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0009
rows.name:
Matter of fact, we're gearing up to go survey the
region right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0010
rows.name:
If you're heading in that direction yourself, make sure
you have all the items and equipment you'll need.
It's not a friendly place for the unprepared.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0011
rows.name:
And if you get there and realize you're overmatched,
there's no shame in cutting your losses and hightailing
it back to New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0012
rows.name:
Anything could happen on this planet, you know?
You have to proceed with great care.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0013
rows.name:
Completing missions is important, but you can't
accomplish anything if you're dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0021
rows.name:
Crystallizing that shock-absorbing gel helped the
Habitat avoid a dangerous impact during the crash
landing, which was great.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0022
rows.name:
But as a result, the gates leading in and out of the city
were covered in that crystallized gunk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0023
rows.name:
Clearing it away was incredibly difficult, to say
the least.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0024
rows.name:
The stuff was hard enough to stop the impact from
New LA's crash landing, so even Skells can barely
chip it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0025
rows.name:
We had to devote most of our people just to clearing
it away from the gates. It's the reason we couldn't start
exploring Mira for a while after we landed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0026
rows.name:
On our next trip to Noctilum, we're planning to
do a joint exploration with some of the Orphe.
I'm actually gearing up for that right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0027
rows.name:
The Orphe make for strange collaborators, but I know
that their advanced technology and familiarity with the
region will prove useful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0028
rows.name:
This will also be the first mission for a new recruit that
I'm expecting great things from.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0029
rows.name:
We'll have to work out an exploration plan that puts
all of our individual talents to good use.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Robert about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0030
rows.name:
I think I'm going to ask Kan'tonam's group to officially
join our team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0031
rows.name:
With their advanced technology and precise decision-
making abilities, I know they'd be a huge asset to us
during missions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0032
rows.name: Humanity sure has made some valuable friends, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev014001_MSG0033
rows.name:
And since it was Elma's team that rescued the Orphe
and forged the alliance with them in the first place,
I suppose we have you to thank.[ST:wait ]
